Source.Name: django-authority
Source.Summary: A Django application for generic per-object permission and custom permission checks
Source.Description: Django-authority is a Django application for generic per-object permission, custom permission checks and permisson requests. It also includes view decorajj small Django application that lets you create application programming ınterfaces (API) for you sites.

Update.Comment: * Fixed an issue with the UserPermissionForm not being able to override the widget of the user field. * Added ability to override form class in ``add_permission`` view. * Added easy way to assign permissions via a permission instance.
